description.@en: I can sleep anywhere: on the road, in the back alley and even with one eye closed on horseback.

data.notes:
Frontier Trait

Professions of this Archetype typically live on the fringes of urban society and in the frontier lands. They make trade off the bounty the land affords them, hiring themselves out as surveyors and protecting others.

effect.@en: You only need three hours of Sleep to restore your Peril Condition Track. In addition, you are always restored to Unhindered after Sleeping, even in unsafe places or when traveling.
